lines.text: When a man's wife thinks he's having an affair, how can he convince her he's not?
He can't.
But I'm not having one!
Doesn't make any difference.
Isn't a man innocent until proven guilty?
Look, you're dealing with your wife. You can forget the Constitution.
George, your hypochondria's showing.
I'm not her good friend. I'm her husband!
Is it a sharp pain, is it a dull pain, or does it grip like a vice
Yes, yes!
Nonono, pick one!
I guess it's a sharp pain, hurts like the dickens when I press it.
Then don't press it!
When he tells me he's dying and he doesn't DIE... wouldn't he know that I'd get SUSPICIOUS?
George, remember our first anniversary?
Remember. I made notes!
You are a one hundred percent, non-shrinkable, no-money-back, rat fink.
Yeah, but a bachelor rat fink!
Egods, you've got cold feet!
Complaints, complaints, nothing but complaints! I could do some complaining, too, you know. You ever cut your toenails?
